code: import actionTypes from"../actionTypes";export var openPromotion=function openPromotion(_ref){var rank=_ref.rank,file=_ref.file,x=_ref.x,y=_ref.y;return{type:actionTypes.PROMOTION_OPEN,payload:{rank:rank,file:file,x:x,y:y}};};export var closePopup=function closePopup(){return{type:actionTypes.PROMOTION_CLOSE};};
